utterances: How can I update my account information?

utterances: Is there a minimum order requirement for delivery?

answers: We don't have a minimum order requirement for delivery. Whether you're ordering a single slice or a full meal, we're here to fulfill your cravings!

answers: Yes, you can! When placing your order online, simply select the desired date and time for delivery or pickup during checkout. We'll make sure your order arrives at the specified time.

answers: We frequently offer promotions and discounts for online orders. Keep an eye on our website or subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated on the latest deals and offers.
